fluff.name: Sorcerer
entries: Golden eyes flashing, a human stretches out her hand and unleashes the dragonfire that burns in her veins. As an inferno rages around her foes, leathery wings spread from her back and she takes to the air.

Long hair whipped by a conjured wind, a half-elf spreads his arms wide and throws his head back. Lifting him momentarily off the ground, a wave of magic surges up in him, through him, and out from him in a mighty blast of lightning.

Crouching behind a stalagmite, a halfling points a finger at a charging troglodyte. A blast of fire springs from her finger to strike the creature. She ducks back behind the rock formation with a grin, unaware that her màgia salvatge has turned her skin bright blue.

Sorcerers carry a magical birthright conferred upon them by an exotic bloodline, some otherworldly influence, or exposure to unknown cosmic forces. One can't study sorcery as one learns a language, any more than one can learn to live a legendary life. No one chooses sorcery; the power chooses the sorcerer.

entries.name: Raw Magic
entries: Magic is a part of every sorcerer, suffusing body, mind, and spirit with a latent power that waits to be tapped. Some sorcerers wield magic that springs from an ancient bloodline infused with the magic of dragons. Others carry a raw, uncontrolled magic within them, a chaotic storm that manifests in unexpected ways.

The appearance of sorcerous powers is wildly unpredictable. Some draconic bloodlines produce exactly one sorcerer in every generation, but in other lines of descent every individual is a sorcerer. Most of the time, the talents of sorcery appear as apparent flukes. Some sorcerers can't name the origin of their power, while others trace it to strange events in their own lives. The touch of a demon, the blessing of a dryad at a baby's birth, or a taste of the water from a mysterious spring might spark the gift of sorcery. So too might the gift of a deity of magic, exposure to the elemental forces of the Inner Planes or the maddening chaos of Limbo, or a glimpse into the inner workings of reality.

Sorcerers have no use for the spellbooks and ancient tomes of magic lore that wizards rely on, nor do they rely on a patron to grant their spells as warlocks do. By learning to harness and channel their own inborn magic, they can discover new and staggering ways to unleash that power.

entries.name: Unexplained Powers
entries: Sorcerers are rare in the world, and it's unusual to find a sorcerer who is not involved in the adventuring life in some way. People with magical power seething in their veins soon discover that the power doesn't like to stay quiet. A sorcerer's magic wants to be wielded, and it has a tendency to spill out in unpredictable ways if it isn't called on.

Sorcerers often have obscure or quixotic motivations driving them to adventure. Some seek a greater understanding of the magical force that infuses them, or the answer to the mystery of its origin. Others hope to find a way to get rid of it, or to unleash its full potential. Whatever their goals, sorcerers are every bit as useful to an adventuring party as wizards, making up for a comparative lack of breadth in their magical knowledge with enormous flexibility in using the spells they know.

entries.name: Creating a Sorcerer
entries: The most important question to consider when creating your sorcerer is the origin of your power. As a starting character, you'll choose an origin that ties to a draconic bloodline or the influence of màgia salvatge, but the exact source of your power is up to you to decide. Is it a family curse, passed down to you from distant ancestors? Or did some extraordinary event leave you blessed with inherent magic but perhaps scarred as well?

How do you feel about the magical power coursing through you? Do you embrace it, try to master it, or revel in its unpredictable nature? Is it a blessing or a curse? Did you seek it out, or did it find you? Did you have the option to refuse it, and do you wish you had? What do you intend to do with it? Perhaps you feel like you've been given this power for some lofty purpose. Or you might decide that the power gives you the right to do what you want, to take what you want from those who lack such power. Perhaps your power links you to a powerful individual in the world—the fey creature that blessed you at birth, the dragon who put a drop of its blood into your veins, the lich who created you as an experiment, or the deity who chose you to carry this power.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a sorcerer quickly by following these suggestions. First, Carisma should be your highest ability score, followed by Constitució. Second, choose the hermit background. Third, choose the {@spell llum}, {@spell prestidigitació}, {@spell raig gebre}, i {@spell shocking grasp} cantrips, along with the 1st-level spells {@spell shield} i {@spell magic missile}.
Practice and study are for amateurs. True power is a birthright.

When it comes to drawing forth their abilities in times of need, sorcerers have it easy compared to other characters. Their power not only rests within them, but it likely takes some effort to keep it at bay. Every sorcerer is born to the role, or stumbles into it through cosmic chance. Unlike other characters, who must actively learn, embrace, and pursue their talents, sorcerers have their power thrust upon them.

Because the idea of an innately magical being traveling among them does not sit well with many folk, sorcerers tend to breed mistrust and suspicion in others they come across. Nonetheless, many sorcerers succeed in overcoming that prejudice through deeds that benefit their less magically gifted contemporaries.

Sorcerers are often defined by the events surrounding the manifestation of their power. For those who receive it as an expected birthright, its appearance is a cause for celebration. Other sorcerers are treated as outcasts, banished from their homes after the sudden, terrifying arrival of their abilities.
Playing a sorcerer character can be as rewarding as it is challenging. The sections below offer suggestions on how to flesh out and personalize your persona.

entries.name: Arcane Origins
entries: Some sorcerers understand where their power came from, based on how their abilities manifested. Others can only speculate, since their powers came to them in a way that suggests no particular cause.

Does your character know the source of your magical power? Does it tie back to some distant relative, a cosmic event, or blind chance? If your sorcerer doesn't know where their power arose from, your DM can use this table (or select an origin) and reveal it to you when the information plays a role in the campaign.

entries.caption: Arcane Origins
rows: Your power arises from your family's bloodline. You are related to some powerful creature, or you inherited a blessing or a curse.
You are the reincarnation of a being from another plane of existence.
A powerful entity entered the world. Its magic changed you.
Your birth was prophesied in an ancient text, and you are foretold to use your power for terrible ends.
You are the product of generations of careful, selective breeding.
You were made in a vat by an alchemist.

entries.name: Reaction
entries: When a new sorcerer enters the world, either at birth or later when one's power becomes evident, the consequences of that event depend greatly on how its witnesses react to what they have seen.
When your sorcerer's powers appeared, how did the world around you respond? Were other people supportive, fearful, or somewhere in between?

entries.caption: Reactions
rows: Your powers are seen as a great blessing by those around you, and you are expected to use them in service to your community.
Your powers caused destruction and even a death when they became evident, and you were treated as a criminal.
Your neighbors hate and fear your power, causing them to shun you.
You came to the attention of a sinister cult that plans on exploiting your abilities.
People around you believe that your powers are a curse levied on your family for a past transgression.
Your powers are believed to be tied to an ancient line of mad kings that supposedly ended in a bloody revolt over a century ago.

entries.name: Supernatural Mark
entries: A sorcerer at rest is almost indistinguishable from a normal person; it's only when their magic flies forth that sorcerers reveal their true nature. Even so, many sorcerers have a subtle but telling physical trait that sets them apart from other folk.
If your sorcerer has a supernatural mark, it might be one that's easily concealed, or it could be a source of pride that you keep on constant display.

entries.caption: Supernatural Marks
rows: Your eyes are an unusual color, such as red.
You have an extra toe on one foot.
One of your ears is noticeably larger than the other.
Your hair grows at a prodigious rate.
You wrinkle your nose repeatedly while you are chewing.
A red splotch appears on your neck once a day, then vanishes after an hour.

entries.name: Signs of Sorcery
entries: As the world well knows, some sorcerers are better than others at controlling their spellcasting. Sometimes a wild display of magic gone awry emanates from a sorcerer who casts a spell. But even when one's magic goes off as planned, the act of casting is often accompanied by a telltale sign that makes it clear where that magical energy came from.

When your sorcerer character casts a spell, does the effort reveal itself in a sign of sorcery? Is this sign tied to your origin or some other aspect of who you are, or is it a seemingly random phenomenon?

entries.caption: Signs of Sorcery
rows: You deliver the verbal components of your spells in the booming voice of a titan.
For a moment after you cast a spell, the area around you grows dark and gloomy.
You sweat profusely while casting a spell and for a few seconds thereafter.
Your hair and garments are briefly buffeted about, as if by a breeze, whenever you call forth a spell.
If you are standing quan llances un conjur, you rise six inches into the air and gently float back down.
Illusory blue flames wreathe your head as you begin your casting, then abruptly disappear.

You might have endured exposure to some form of raw magic, perhaps through a planar portal leading to Limbo, the Elemental Planes, or the mysterious Far Realm. Perhaps you were blessed by a powerful fey creature or marked by a demon. Or your magic could be a fluke of your birth, with no apparent cause or reason. However it came to be, this chaotic magic churns within you, waiting for any outlet.

For the next minute, you regain 5 punts de vida a l'inici de cada torn teu.
You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
You cast {@spell grease} centered on yourself.
Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell can end this effect.
An eye appears on your forehead for the next minute. During that time, you have advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin veure-hi.
For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
You teleport fins a 60 peus en un espai desocupat (escull) que puguis veure.
You are transported to the Astral Plane fins el final del teu proper torn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
Roll a {@dice d10}. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
{@dice 1d6} {@creature flumph||flumphs} controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces a 60 peus de tu and are {@condition frightened} de tu. They vanish after 1 minute.
You regain {@dice 2d10} punts de vida.

You turn into a potted plant fins l'inici del teu proper torn. While a plant, you are {@condition incapacitated} and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 punts de vida, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
For the next minute, you can teleport fins a 20 peus com a acció bonus a cada torn teu.
You cast {@spell levitate} on yourself.
Una {@creature unicorn} controlled by the DM appears in a space a 5 peus de tu, then disappears 1 minute later.
You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to {@spell magic missile}.
You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next {@dice 5d6} days.
Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
You cast {@spell núvol de boira} centered on yourself.
Up to three creatures you choose a 30 peus de tu take {@damage 4d10} de dany elèctric.
You are {@condition frightened} by the nearest creature fins el final del teu proper torn.
Tota criatura a 30 peus de tu becomes {@condition invisible} for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
You gain resistance to all damage for the next minute.
A random creature a 60 peus de tu becomes {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 1d4} hours.
You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn a 5 peus de tu is {@condition blinded} fins el final del seu proper torn.
You cast {@spell polimorfia} on yourself. If you fail the saving throw, you turn into a sheep for the spell's duration.
Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air a 10 peus de tu for the next minute.
You can take one additional action immediately.
Tota criatura a 30 peus de tu takes {@damage 1d10} de dany necròtic. You regain punts de vida equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
You cast {@spell imatge mirall}.
You cast {@spell fly} on a random creature a 60 peus de tu.
You become {@condition invisible} for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the {@spell reincarnate} spell.
Your size increases by one size category for the next minute.
You and all creatures a 30 peus de tu gain vulnerability to dany perforant for the next minute.
You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
You regain all expended punts de fetilleria.

subclassFeature.name: Bend Luck
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you have the ability to twist fate using your màgia salvatge. Quan una altra criatura que puguis veure makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction and spend 2 punts de fetilleria to roll {@dice 1d4} and apply the number rolled as a bonus or penalty (escull) to the creature's roll. You can do so after the creature rolls but before any effects of the roll occur.

subclassFeature.name: Controlled Chaos
entries: A nivell 14, you gain a modicum of control over the surges of your màgia salvatge. Whenever you roll on the {@table Màgia Salvatge Surge|PHB} table, you can roll twice and use either number.

subclassFeature.name: Spell Bombardment
entries: Començant a nivell 18, the harmful energy of your spells intensifies. When you roll damage for a spell and roll the highest number possible on any of the dice, choose one of those dice, roll it again and add that roll to the damage. You can use the feature only un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Pyromancer (PSK)
entries: Your innate magic manifests in fire. You are your fire, and your fire is you.

subclassFeature.name: Heart of Fire
entries: A nivell 1, whenever you start casting a spell of 1st level or higher that deals fire damage, fiery magic erupts from you. This eruption causes creatures (escull) que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu to take fire damage equal to half your sorcerer level (mínim d'1).

subclassFeature.name: Fire in the Veins
entries: A nivell 6, you gain resistance to fire damage. A més, spells you cast ignore resistance to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Pyromancer's Fury
entries: Començant a nivell 14, when you are hit by a atac cos a cos, pots, com a reacció, deal fire damage to the attacker. The damage equals your sorcerer level, and ignores resistance to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Fiery Soul
entries: A nivell 18, you gain immunity to fire damage. A més, any spell or effect you create ignores resistance to fire damage and treats immunity to fire damage as resistance to fire damage.

subclassFeature.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: An alien influence has wrapped its tendrils around your mind, giving you poder psiònic. You can now touch other minds with that power and alter the world around you by using it to control the magical energy of the multiverse. Will this power shine from you as a hopeful beacon to others? Or will you be a source of terror to those who feel the stab of your mind and witness the strange manifestations of your might?

As an Aberrant Mind sorcerer, you decide how you acquired your powers. Were you born with them? Or did an event later in life leave you shining with psionic awareness? Consult the Aberrant Origins table for a possible origin of your power.

entries.caption: Aberrant Origins
rows: You were exposed to the Far Realm's warping influence. You are convinced that a tentacle is now growing on you, but no one else can see it.
A psychic wind from the Astral Plane carried psionic energy to you. When you use your powers, faint motes of light sparkle around you.
You once suffered the dominating powers of an aboleth, leaving a psychic splinter in your mind.
You were implanted with a mind flayer tadpole, but the ceremorphosis never completed. And now its poder psiònic is yours. When you use it, your flesh shines with a strange mucus.
As a child, you had an imaginary friend that looked like a flumph or a strange platypus-like creature. One day, it gifted you with poders psiònics, which have ended up being not so imaginary.
Your nightmares whisper the truth to you: your poders psiònics are not your own. You draw them from your parasitic twin!

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Spells
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 1}

You learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown on the Psionic Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a {@filter divination or an enchantment spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or llista de conjurs de mag|spells|class=sorcerer;warlock;wizard|school=D;E|level=1;2;3;4;5}.

entries.caption: Psionic Spells
rows: {@spell arms of Hadar}, {@spell xiuxiuejos de disbauxa}, {@spell mind sliver|tce}
{@spell apaivagar emocions}, {@spell detectar pensaments}
{@spell hunger of Hadar}, {@spell encàrrec}
{@spell Tentacles Obscurs de l'Evard}, {@spell summon aberration|TCE}
{@spell Rary's telepathic bond}, {@spell telequinesi}

subclassFeature.name: Telepathic Speech
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 1}

You can form a telepathic connection between your mind and the mind of another. Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. You and la criatura designada can speak telepathically with each other while the two of you are within a number of miles of each other equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'1 mile). To understand each other, you each must speak mentally in a language the other knows.

The telepathic connection lasts for a number of minutes equal to your sorcerer level. It ends early si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} o si mors or if you use this ability to form a connection with a different creature.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Sorcery
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 6}

When you cast any spell of 1st level or higher from your Psionic Spells feature, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of punts de fetilleria equal to the spell's level.
If you cast the spell using punts de fetilleria, it requires no verbal or somatic components, and it requires no material components, unless they are consumed by the spell.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Defenses
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 6}
You gain resistance to psychic damage, and tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Revelation in Flesh
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 14}

You can unleash the aberrant truth hidden within yourself. Com a acció bonus, you can spend 1 or more punts de fetilleria to magically transform your body durant 10 minuts. For each punt de fetilleria you spend, you can gain one of the following benefits (escull), the effects of which last until the transformation ends:

items: You can see any {@condition invisible} creature a 60 peus de tu, provided it isn't behind total cover. Your eyes also turn black or become writhing sensory tendrils.
You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and pots flotar. As you fly, your skin glistens with mucus or shines with an otherworldly light.

You gain a swimming speed equal to twice your walking speed, i pots respirar sota l'aigua. Moreover, gills grow from your neck or fan out from behind your ears, your fingers become webbed, or you grow writhing cilia that extend through your clothing.

Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes slimy and pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

subclassFeature.name: Warping Implosion
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 18}

You can unleash your aberrant power as a space-warping anomaly. Com a acció, you can teleport en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu. Immediatament after you disappear, tota criatura within 30 feet of the space you left ha de salvar per Força. Si falla, a creature takes {@damage 3d10} de dany de força and is pulled straight toward the space you left, ending en un espai desocupat as close to your former space as possible. Si supera, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, unless you spend 5 punts de fetilleria to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Clockwork Soul
entries: The cosmic force of order has suffused you with magic. That power arises from Mechanus or a realm like it-a plane of existence shaped entirely by clockwork efficiency. You, or someone from your lineage, might have become entangled in the machinations of the modrons, the orderly beings who inhabit Mechanus. Perhaps your ancestor even took part in the Great Modron March. Whatever its origin within you, the power of order can seem strange to others, but for you, it is part of a vast and glorious system.

subclassFeature.name: Clockwork Magic
entries: {@i tret de Clockwork Soul a nivell 1}

You learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown on the Clockwork Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be an {@filter abjuration or a transmutation spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or llista de conjurs de mag|spells|class=sorcerer;warlock;wizard|school=A;T|level=1;2;3;4;5}.

rows: {@spell alarma}, {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}
{@spell aid}, {@spell restabliment menor}
{@spell dissipar màgia}, {@spell protegir de l'energia}
{@spell llibertat de moviments}, {@spell summon construct|TCE}
{@spell restabliment superior}, {@spell paret de força}

entries: A més, consult the Manifestations of Order table and choose or randomly determine a way your connection to order manifests while you are casting any of your sorcerer spells.

entries.caption: Manifestations of Order
rows: Spectral cogwheels hover behind you.
The hands of a clock spin in your eyes.
Your skin glows with a brassy sheen.
Floating equations and geometric objects overlay your body.
Your spellcasting focus temporarily takes the form of a Tiny clockwork mechanism.
The ticking of gears or ringing of a clock can be heard by you and those affected by your magic.

subclassFeature.name: Restore Balance
entries: {@i tret de Clockwork Soul a nivell 1}

Your connection to the plane of absolute order allows you to equalize chaotic moments. Quan una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu is about to roll a {@dice d20} with advantage or disadvantage, pots, com a reacció, prevent the roll from being affected by advantage and disadvantage.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Bastion of Law
entries: {@i tret de Clockwork Soul a nivell 6}

You can tap into the grand equation of existence to imbue a creature with a shimmering shield of order. Com a acció, you can expend 1 to 5 punts de fetilleria to create a magical ward around yourself or another creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The ward lasts fins que acabis un Descans Llarg or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret.

The ward is represented by a number of {@dice d8}s equal to the number of punts de fetilleria spent to create it. When the warded creature takes damage, it can expend a number of those dice, roll them, and reduce the damage taken by the total rolled on those dice.

subclassFeature.name: Trance of Order
entries: {@i tret de Clockwork Soul a nivell 14}

You gain the ability to align your consciousness to the endless calculations of Mechanus. Com a acció bonus, you can enter this state durant 1 minut. For the duration, attack rolls against you can't benefit from advantage, and whenever you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the {@dice d20} as a 10.
Un cop empris aquesta acció bonus, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, unless you spend 5 punts de fetilleria to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Clockwork Cavalcade
entries: {@i tret de Clockwork Soul a nivell 18}

You summon spirits of order to expunge disorder around you. Com a acció, you summon the spirits in a 30-foot cube originating from you. The spirits look like modrons or other constructs (escull). The spirits are intangible and invulnerable, and they create the following effects within the cube before vanishing:

items: The spirits restore up to 100 punts de vida, divided as you choose among any number of creatures (escull) in the cube.
Any damaged objects entirely in the cube are repaired instantly.
Every spell of 6th level or lower ends on creatures and objects (escull) in the cube.

entries: Once you use this action, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, unless you spend 7 punts de fetilleria to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Soul
entries: One day a light blazed forth within you—the illumination of poder psiònic. Your mind now simmers with this power, the full extent of which you won't fully grasp for years to come. You can touch other minds with it and alter the world around you by using it to control the magical energy of the multiverse. Will this power shine from you as a hopeful beacon to others? Or will you be a source of terror to those who feel the stab of your mind and witness the strange manifestations of your might?

Among githyanki and githzerai, the powers of Psionic Soul sorcerers are revered and marshaled on both sides of the gith war. In Eberron, many kalashtar dream of discovering this origin's abilities within themselves, and in Athas, more sorcerers are born with a Psionic Soul than with any other source of power. In the glades of primeval woods touched by la Terra Fata, children sometimes awaken to the wonders of poder psiònic. And in communities that survive Far Realm incursions, some folk are mutated into horrific aberrations, while a lucky few not only remain themselves, but also discover that psionic energy now suffuses their minds.

As a Psionic Soul sorcerer, you decide how you acquired your powers. Were you born with them, and did they manifest throughout childhood? Or did an extraordinary event later in life leave you shining with psionic awareness? Consult the Psionic Origins table for a possible origin of your power.

entries.caption: Psionic Origins
rows: You were exposed to the Far Realm's warping influence. You can now use your mind in ways you never thought possible, and you're also convinced that a tendril is growing upon you.
A psychic wind from the Astral Plane carried psionic energy into your being. When you use your powers now, faint motes of light sparkle around you.
You or your ancestor were trained by a githzerai monk to unlock the psionic potential within yourself.
A spirit haunts your mind, lending incredible power to your thoughts. When you sleep, the spirit's memories invade your dreams.

Deep in a forest touched by la Terra Fata, you drank from a glimmering stream, and now your mind shines with power. Beasts and fey creatures are often now friendly to you, as if they can sense the light within you.
Upon recovering from a near-fatal injury, you found yourself with poders psiònics. Whenever you use them, your old wound tingles.
You were implanted with a mind flayer tadpole, but the ceremorphosis never completed. And now the poder psiònic is yours. When you use it, your flesh shines with a strange mucus.
As a child, you had an imaginary friend that looked like a flumph or a strange platypuslike creature. One day, it gifted you with poders psiònics, which have ended up being not so imaginary.
Your nightmares whisper the truth to you: your poders psiònics are not your own. You draw them from your vestigial twin!
You grew up near the lair of a sapphire dragon, and now your eyes glow with sapphire light when you use your newfound powers.

subclassFeature.name: Talent Psiònic
entries: {@i tret de Psionic Soul a nivell 1}

You harbor a wellspring of poder psiònic within yourself, an energy that ebbs and flows as you channel it in various ways. This power is represented by el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, the starting size of which is a {@dice d6}.

entries.name: Opcions de Talent Psiònic
entries: You can use el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic in the following ways:

items.name: Psionic Discovery.
items.entry: You can unlock the ability to cast a mind-oriented sorcerer spell you don't already know. After meditating durant 10 minuts (which can be done during a rest), roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, and choose a sorcerer spell of a level for which you have ranures de conjur and that is in the escola de divinació or enchantment. You know the chosen spell for a number of hours equal to the number you rolled.

items.name: Psychic Sorcery.
items.entry: Quan llances un conjur, you can use your mind to form it, rather than relying on words, gestures, and materials. To do so, roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic. The spell then requires no verbal component, and if you rolled the level of the spell or higher, the spell doesn't require somatic or material components either.

items.name: Telepathic Speech.
items.entry: You can form a telepathic connection between your mind and the mind of another. Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure, and roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic. For a number of hours equal to the number you rolled, you and la criatura designada can speak telepathically with each other while the two of you are within a number of miles of each other equal to the number you rolled. To understand each other, you each must speak mentally in a language the other knows. The telepathic connection ends early if you use this ability to form a connection with a different creature.

entries.name: Canviar el Tamany del Dau
entries: If you roll the highest number on el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, it es redueix un tamany after the roll. This represents you burning through your psionic energy. For example, if the die is a {@dice d6} and you roll a 6, it becomes a {@dice d4}. If it's a {@dice d4} and you roll a 4, it becomes unusable fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

Conversely, if you roll a 1 on el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic, it increases by one die size after the roll, up to its starting size. This represents you conserving psionic energy for later use. For example, if you roll a 1 on a {@dice d4}, the die then becomes a {@dice d6}.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic resets to its starting size. Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, the starting size of el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic increases: a nivell 5 ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}).

entries.name: Recàrrega Psi
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can calm your mind for a moment and restore el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic to its starting size. You then can't use Recàrrega Psi again fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Strike
entries: {@i tret de Psionic Soul a nivell 6}

You have learned to channel additional psychic energy into your spells. Immediatament after you deal damage to a creature with a sorcerer spell for which you expend a spell slot, you can roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and also deal psychic damage to that creature equal to the number rolled. You can deal this extra damage only un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Mind Over Body
entries: {@i tret de Psionic Soul a nivell 14}

You can now use the psi that flows through you to give your body extraordinary abilities. Com a acció bonus, you can roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and spend 1 or more punts de fetilleria to magically transform yourself for a number of hours equal to the number rolled. Until the transformation ends, you gain one of the following benefits (escull) for each punt de fetilleria you spent, choosing a different benefit for each point:

items: You can see any {@condition invisible} creature a 60 peus de tu, provided it isn't behind total cover.
You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed, and pots flotar.
You gain a swimming speed equal to twice your walking speed, i pots respirar sota l'aigua.

Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Aura
entries: {@i tret de Psionic Soul a nivell 18}

If el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic is available, you can unleash your poder psiònic in a crackling aura of psychic energy; com a acció bonus, you can magically radiate this transparent, 30-foot-radius aura durant 1 minut o fins que et quedis {@condition incapacitated} or lose the use of el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic.

Whenever a creature starts its turn in the aura or moves into it per primer cop en un torn, you can roll el teu Dau de Talent Psiònic and deal psychic damage to the creature, equaling the number rolled plus el teu modificador de Carisma. If the creature takes any of this damage, its speed is halved fins el final del seu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Clockwork Soul
entries: A plane of utmost order, Mechanus is a realm overseen by a godlike entity called Primus, whose actions are inscrutable and calculations, vast. You, or someone from your lineage, might have become entangled in one of the machinations of the leader of the modrons. Perhaps you were exposed to an artifact created by Primus, or your ancestor took part in the Great Modron March in some way.

The power of Mechanus can seem strange and alien to others, but for you it is part of a vast and glorious system that others can't comprehend. At your option, you can pick from or roll on the Manifestations of Mechanus table to create a way your connection to the plane manifests while you are casting a spell.

rows: Large, spectral cogwheels appear hovering behind you.
The hands of a clock appear in your eyes.
Your skin glows with a golden, metallic sheen.
Your features become unnaturally angular, like geometric objects.
Your spellcasting focus takes the form of a miniature Spawning Stone or other creation of Primus.
The ringing of a clock can be heard by you and those affected by your magic.

You learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown on the Clockwork Spells table. Each spell counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know. These spells can't be replaced when you gain a level en aquesta classe.

You can imbue a creature with a shimmering shield of order. Com a acció, you can expend 1 to 5 punts de fetilleria to create a magical ward around yourself or another creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The ward lasts fins que acabis un Descans Llarg or fins que tornis a emprar aquest tret.

The ward is represented by a number of {@dice d8}s equal to the number of punts de fetilleria spent to create it. When the warded creature takes damage, it can use its reaction to spend a number of those dice, roll them, and reduce the damage taken by the total of the spent dice.

The spirits are intangible and invulnerable, work fast and efficiently, and create the following effects within the cube before vanishing:

Any damaged objects entirely in the cube are repaired.
Every spell of 6th level or lower ends on creatures and objects (escull) in the cube.

subclassFeature.name: Giant Soul (UA)
entries: The giants once dwelled in a fabled realm known as Ostoria, a paradise for their folk that reflected their mastery of the mortal realm. In time, Ostoria fell, and the giants were scattered and broken. During that mythic era, the giants granted a few chosen individuals among the small folk a shard of their great power. These favored people were caught in the same tragedy that sundered Ostoria. Since that time, they have spread across the many worlds of the multiverse. Now and again, one of their descendants manifests the gifts imparted by the giants, granting them sorcerous magic that allows them to command the elements and gain the might of a giant.

subclassFeature.name: Jotun Resilience
entries: The resilience of giants flows through your body. A nivell 1, els teus punts de vida màxims increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Mark of the Ordning
entries: A nivell 1, you discover innate magical abilities within yourself that are based on your giant heritage. Select one of the giant types from the Mark of the Ordning table. At 1st and 3rd level, aprèns el conjurs associated with your choice, as shown in the table. These spells count as sorcerer spells for you, but they don't count against your number of sorcerer spells known.

rows: {@creature Cloud Giant}
{@spell núvol de boira}, {@spell minor illusion}
{@spell invisibilitat}
{@creature Fire Giant}
{@spell mans ardents}, {@spell fire bolt}
{@spell esfera de flames}
{@creature Frost Giant}
{@spell armadura d'Àgathys}, {@spell raig gebre}
{@spell immobilitzar humanoide}
{@creature Hill Giant}
{@spell heroisme}, {@spell shillelagh}
{@spell engrandir/enxiquir}
{@creature Stone Giant}
{@spell enredar}, {@resistència a conjurs}
{@spell brot d'espines}
{@creature Storm Giant}
{@spell shocking grasp}, {@spell tronada}
{@spell ràfega de vent}

subclassFeature.name: Soul of Lost Ostoria
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you gain a benefit whenever you cast one of the spells granted by your Mark of the Ordning Feature.

entries.name: Cloud Giant
entries: Immediatament after you cast any of your Mark of the Ordning spells, you can magically teleport com a acció bonus. You teleport en un espai desocupat que puguis veure that is no farther away than a number of feet equal to 10 + el teu modificador de Constitució.

entries.name: Fire Giant
entries: You gain a bonus to the damage rolls of your Mark of the Ordning spells. The bonus equals el teu modificador de Constitució (mínim de +1).

entries.name: Frost Giant
entries: Immediatament after you cast any of your Mark of the Ordning spells, you gain punts de vida temporals equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1). But if the spell is {@spell armadura d'Àgathys}, you instead increase its punts de vida temporals by an amount equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1).

entries.name: Hill Giant
entries: Immediatament after you cast any of your Mark of the Ordning spells, you can target up to two creatures a 5 peus de tu que puguis veure. Each target ha de salvar per Força. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or be pushed a number of peus lluny de tu equal to 5 + el teu modificador de Constitució (mínim de +1). A target can choose to fail this save.

entries.name: Stone Giant
entries: Immediatament after you cast any of your Mark of the Ordning spells, you gain a bonus to AC equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim de +1) fins el final del teu proper torn.

entries.name: Storm Giant
entries: Immediatament after you cast any of your Mark of the Ordning spells, up to three creatures (escull) que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu take lightning damage equivalent al teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1).

subclassFeature.name: Rage of Fallen Ostoria
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you gain the ability to channel the souls of your ancestors into your physical form. When you start casting a sorcerer spell en el teu torn and expend a spell slot, you can increase your size by one category—from Medium to Large, for example.
This increase dura 1 minut. It ends early if you die or are {@condition incapacitated}. Until it ends, you enjoy the following benefits:

items: Your punts de vida actuals and els teus punts de vida màxims both increase by 1 per sorcerer level.
Your reach increases by 5 feet.
La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 5 peus.
Tens avantatge a tirades i salvades de Força.
You gain a bonus to the damage rolls of your atac armat cos a coss; the bonus equals el teu modificador de Constitució (mínim de +1).

entries: Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Blessing of the All Father
entries: A nivell 18, your Constitució score increases by 2, up to a maximum of 22.

A més, you can now use Rage of Fallen Ostoria twice between rests, but no more than once on a turn. If you use that feature while under its effects, its increases to your size, punts de vida, reach, and walking speed are cumulative.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow
entries: Your innate magic comes from the Erm de l'Ombra. You might trace your lineage to an entity from that place, or perhaps you were exposed to its fell energy and transformed in some fundamental manner.

The power of shadow magic casts a strange pall over your physical presence. The spark of life that sustains you is muffled, as if it struggles to remain viable against the dark energy that imbues your soul. At your option, you can pick from or roll on the following table to create a unique quirk for your character.

entries.caption: Shadow Sorcerer Quirks
rows: You are always icy cold to the touch.
When you are asleep, you don't appear to breathe (though you must still breathe to survive).
You don't seem to bleed, even when badly injured.
Your heart beats once per minute. This even sometimes surprises you.
You have trouble remembering that living creatures and corpses should be treated differently.
You blinked. Once. Last week.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Dark
entries: From 1st level, you have {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 60 peus. Pots llançar el conjur {@spell foscor} by spending 1 punt de fetilleria. que puguis veure through any {@spell foscor} spell you cast using this ability.

subclassFeature.name: Força of the Grave
entries: Començant a nivell 1, your existence in a twilight state between life and death makes you difficult to defeat. Whenever damage reduces you to 0 punts de vida, you can make a Constitució saving throw (CD 5 + the damage taken). On a success, you instead drop to 1 punt de vida. You cannot use this feature if you are reduced to 0 punts de vida by radiant damage or by a critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Hound of Ill Omen
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to call forth a howling creature of darkness to harass your foes. Com a acció bonus, pots gastar 3 punts de fetilleria to summon a hound of ill omen to target one creature que puguis veure. The hound uses a dire wolf's statistics with the following changes:

items: The hound is size Medium.
It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The hound takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
At the start of its turn, the hound automatically knows its target's location. If the target was hidden, it is no longer hidden from the hound.

entries: The hound appears en un espai desocupat (escull) within 30 feet of the target. Roll initiative for the hound. On its turn, it can move only towards its target by the most direct route, and it can use its action only to attack its target. The hound makes opportunity attack, but only against its target. A més, the target has disadvantage on all saving throws against your spells while the hound is within 5 feet of it. The hound disappears if it is reduced to 0 punts de vida, if its target is reduced to 0 punts de vida, or after 5 minutes.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Walk
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to step from one shadow into another. When you are in dim light or darkness, com a acció bonus, you can teleport fins a 120 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure that is also in dim light or darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Form
entries: A nivell 18, pots gastar 3 punts de fetilleria to transform yourself into a shadow form com a acció bonus. In this form, tens resistència a tot tipus de dany except force damage, and you can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. You take 5 force damage if you end your turn inside an object. You remain in this form durant 1 minut.

subclassFeature.name: Favored Soul
entries: You have been chosen by a deity, and bestowed with a fragment of their divine power. You have been fundamentally changed by the touch of this deity, which awakens powerful magical abilities inside you.

subclassFeature.name: Competència Adicional
entries: A nivell 1, you gain proficiency in light armor, medium armor, shields, and simple weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Chosen of the Gods
entries: A nivell 1, you choose one of the cleric class's divine domains. You add that domain's spells for 1st-level clerics to your known spells. These spells do not count against the number of spells you can know, and they are considered to be sorcerer spells for you. When you reach 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th levels in the sorcerer class, you likewise learn your domain's spells that become available at those levels.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 6, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Wings
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to sprout a pair of wings from your back (feathered or bat-like, your choice), gaining a flying speed equal to your current walking speed. You can create these wings com a acció bonus en el teu torn. They last until you dismiss them com a acció bonus en el teu torn.
You can't manifest your wings while wearing armor unless the armor is made to accommodate them, and clothing not made to accommodate your wings might be destroyed when you manifest them.

subclassFeature.name: Power of the Chosen
entries: Començant a nivell 18, when you cast one of the spells you learned from your Chosen of the Gods class feature, you regain punts de vida equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim de +1) + the spell's level.

subclassFeature.name: Favored Soul v3
entries: Sometimes the spark of magic that fuels a sorcerer comes from a divine source that glimmers within the soul. Having such a favored soul, your innate magic might come from a distant but powerful familial connection to a divine being. Perhaps your ancestor was an angel, transformed into a mortal and sent to fight in a god's name. Or your birth might align with an ancient prophecy, marking you as a servant of the gods or a chosen vessel of divine magic.

Favored souls, with their natural magnetism and strong personalities, are often seen as threats by traditional religious hierarchies. As outsiders who command the power of the gods, these sorcerers can undermine the existing order and claim a direct tie to the divine.

In some cultures, only those who can claim the power of a favored soul may command religious power. In these lands, ecclesiastical positions are dominated by a few bloodlines and preserved over generations.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Magic
entries: Your link to the divine allows you to learn spells normally associated with the cleric class. When your Spellcasting feature lets you learn a sorcerer cantrip or a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher, you can choose the new spell de la llista de conjurs de clèrgue, in addition to the sorcerer spell list. You must otherwise obey all the restrictions for selecting the spell, and it becomes a sorcerer spell for you.
You also learn the {@spell curar ferides} spell, which does not count against your number of sorcerer spells known.

subclassFeature.name: Favored by the Gods
entries: Començant a nivell 1, divine power guards your destiny. If you fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Healing
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the celestial energy coursing through you can empower your healing magic. Whenever you roll dice to determine the number of punts de vida a sorcerer spell of yours restores, pots gastar 1 punt de fetilleria to reroll any number of those dice once.

subclassFeature.name: Angelic Form
entries: A nivell 14, your divine essence causes you to undergo a minor physical transformation. Your appearance takes on an otherworldly version of one of the following qualities (escull): beautiful, youthful, kind, or imposing.

A més, com a acció bonus, you can manifest a pair of spectral wings from your back. The wings last until you're {@condition incapacitated} or you dismiss them com a acció bonus. While the wings are present, tens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus.

subclassFeature.name: Unearthly Recovery
entries: A nivell 18, you gain the ability to overcome grievous injuries. Com a acció bonus when you have less than half of your punts de vida remaining, you can regain a number of punts de vida equal to half els teus punts de vida màxims.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

Or your birth might align with an ancient prophecy, marking you as a servant of the gods or a chosen vessel of divine magic.

subclassFeature.name: Supernatural Resilience
entries: A nivell 1, the blessing of the gods grants you enhanced durability. Els teus punts de vida màxims increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Countenance
entries: A nivell 6, your divine essence causes you to undergo a minor physical transformation. Your appearance takes on an otherworldly version of one of the following qualities (escull): beautiful, youthful, kind, or imposing.
Whatever your choice, if el teu bonus de competència applies to a Carisma check, double that bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Purity
entries: A nivell 14, you become immune to disease, poison damage, and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

subclassFeature.name: Unearthly Recovery

Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Phoenix Sorcery (UA)
entries: Your power draws from the immortal flame that fuels the legendary phoenix. You or your ancestors perhaps rendered a phoenix a great service, or you were born in its presence. Whatever the cause, a shard of the phoenix's power dwells within you.

That power is a mixed blessing. Like the mythical creature, you can invoke fiery energy and gain the ability to cheat death itself. This power comes at a cost. The fire within you seethes, demanding to be unleashed. You sometimes find yourself absentmindedly feeding fires. You can't bear to allow a fire to sputter out. You feel most comfortable while holding a lit torch or sitting in front of a campfire.

More importantly, this gift comes with no special protection from fire. You are as vulnerable as any other creature to fiery magic, including your own. Phoenix sorcerers can use their powers to pull themselves back from the brink of death, and all too often their own, rash nature or reliance on destructive magic is what puts them there in the first place.

Such sorcerers are wanderers by necessity. The volatile nature of their magic makes other folk nervous. If a fire breaks out in town, a phoenix sorcerer had best flee, whether guilty or not. Fire is a dangerous force, and phoenix sorcerers have a reputation (deserved or not) for reckless behavior, confident that the essence of the phoenix can save them.

entries.caption: Phoenix Soul Quirks
rows: You absentmindedly ignite small fires that quickly sputter out.
You cackle like a diastre when you unleash your fire spells.
You admire fire, even if it burns your friends.
You are covered in burns that mark the first time your power manifested.
You like your food charred.
You are brave to the point of recklessness.

subclassFeature.name: Ignite
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to start fires with a touch. Com a acció, you can magically ignite a flammable object you touch with your hand—an object such as a torch, a piece of tinder, or the hem of drapes.

subclassFeature.name: Mantle of Flame
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you can unleash the phoenix fire that blazes within you.
Com a acció bonus, you magically wreathe yourself in swirling fire, as your eyes glow like hot coals. Durant 1 minut, reps els beneficis següents:

items: You shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.
Any creature takes fire damage equal to el teu modificador de Carisma if it t'impacti amb un atac cos a cos from a 5 peus de tu or if it touches you.
Whenever you roll fire damage en el teu torn, the roll gains a bonus to equal to el teu modificador de Carisma.

entries: Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Phoenix Spark
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the fiery energy within you grows restless and vengeful. In the face of defeat, it surges outward to preserve you in a fiery roar.

If you are reduced to 0 punts de vida, pots, com a reacció, draw on the spark of the phoenix. You are instead reduced to 1 punt de vida, and tota criatura a 10 peus de tu takes fire damage equal to half your sorcerer level + el teu modificador de Carisma.

If you use this feature while under the effects of your Mantle of Flame, this feature instead deals fire damage equal to your sorcerer level + double el teu modificador de Carisma, and your Mantle of Flame immediately ends.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Nourishing Fire
entries: Començant a nivell 14, your fire spells soothe and restore you. When you expend a spell slot to cast a spell that includes a fire damage roll, you regain punts de vida equal to the slot's level + el teu modificador de Carisma.

subclassFeature.name: Form of the Phoenix
entries: A nivell 18, you finally master the spark of fire that dances within you. While under the effect of your Mantle of Flame feature, you gain additional benefits:

items: Tens una velocitat de vol de 40 peus and can hover.
Tens resistència a tot tipus de dany.
If you use your Phoenix Spark, that feature deals an extra 20 fire damage to tota criatura.

subclassFeature.name: Sea Sorcery (UA)
entries: The power of water is the strength of flexibility, resilience, and a relentless nature. Water parts to allow a ship to sail over it or a diver to plunge into it, but their passing leaves no mark. Water flowing down a mountain reaches the sea. It might bend and turn across valleys and down hillsides, but it slowly and steadily returns to the waves. Those whose souls are touched by the power of elemental water command a similar power.

Your heritage ties to powerful creatures of the sea, such as nereids, the lords of the merfolk, and elemental powers. Like a river, you feel the call of the ocean. The call is ever present in your heart, and you are never completely at peace until you are near the sea.

subclassFeature.name: Curse of the Sea
entries: When you choose this origin a nivell 1, you learn the secret of infusing your spells with a watery curse.

Quan impactes a una criatura with a cantrip's attack or quan una criatura fails a saving throw against your cantrip, you can curse the target fins el final del teu proper torn or until you curse a different creature with this feature.

Un cop per torn quan llances un conjur, you can trigger the curse if that spell deals cold or lightning damage to the cursed target or forces it to move. Doing so subjects the target to the appropriate additional effect below, and then the curse ends if the spell isn't a cantrip (you choose the effect to use if more than one effect applies):

entries.name: Cold damage
entries: If the affected target takes cold damage from your spell, the target's speed is also reduced by 15 feet fins el final del teu proper torn. If the spell already reduces the target's speed, use whichever reduction is greater.

entries.name: Lightning Damage
entries: If the affected target takes lightning damage from your spell, L'objectiu rep additional lightning damage equal to el teu modificador de Carisma.

entries.name: Forced Movement
entries: If the target is moved by your spell, increase the distance it is moved by 15 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Soul of the Sea
entries: A nivell 1, your tie to the sea grants you the ability to breathe underwater, and you have a swim speed equal to your walking speed.

subclassFeature.name: Watery Defense
entries: A nivell 6, you gain resistance to fire damage.

You also gain the ability to defend yourself by momentarily assuming a watery form. Com a reacció when you are hit by an attack and take dany contundent, tallant o perforant from it, you can reduce that damage by an amount equal to your sorcerer level plus your Carisma score, and then you can move fins a 30 peus without provoking opportunity attacks. Once you use this special reaction, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Shifting Form
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you gain the ability to enter a liquid state while moving.
When you move en el teu torn, you take only half damage from opportunity attacks, and you can move through any enemy's space but can't willingly end your move there.

En el teu torn, you can move through any space that is at least 3 inches in diameter and do so without squeezing. When you stop moving, the regular squeezing rules apply if you're in a space one size smaller than you. You can't willingly stop in a space smaller than that, and if you're forced to do so, you immediately flow to the nearest space that can fit you, back along the path of your movement.

subclassFeature.name: Water Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 18, your being is altered by the power of the sea. Reps els beneficis següents:

items: You no longer need to eat, drink, or sleep.
A critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.
Tens resistència al dany contundent, perforant, i tallant.

subclassFeature.name: Stone Sorcery (UA)
entries: Your magic springs from a mystical link between your soul and the magic of elemental earth. You might trace a distant ancestor to the Plane of Earth, or your family might have earned a mighty boon in return for a service to the dao lords. Whatever your past, the magic of elemental earth is yours to command.

Your link to earth magic grants you extraordinary resilience, and stone sorcerers have a natural affinity for combat. A steel blade feels like a natural extension of your body, and sorcerers with this origin have a knack for wielding both shields and weapons. In combat your place is amid the fray. You rely on your elemental nature to shield you from harm and your magic and metal weapons to overwhelm your foes.

subclassFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: A nivell 1, tens competència amb shields, simple weapons, and martial weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Stone's Durability
entries: A nivell 1, your connection to stone gives you extra fortitude. Els teus punts de vida màxims increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe.

Com a acció, you can gain a base AC of 13 + el teu modificador de Constitució if you aren't wearing armor, and your skin assumes a stony appearance. This effect lasts until you end it com a acció bonus, you are {@condition incapacitated}, or you don armor other than a shield.

subclassFeature.name: Stone: Metal Magic
entries: Your affinity for metal gives you the option to learn some non-sorcerer spells that focus on weapon attacks. When your Spellcasting feature lets you learn a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher, you can select the spell from the following list of spells, in addition to the sorcerer spell list. You must otherwise obey all the restrictions for selecting the spell, and it becomes a sorcerer spell for you.

entries.caption: Metal Magic
rows: {@spell forçar el duel}, {@spell searing smite}, {@spell thunderous smite}, {@spell càstig colèric}
{@spell càstig marcador}, {@spell arma màgica}
{@spell blinding smite}, {@spell arma elemental}
{@spell càstig abraonador}

subclassFeature.name: Stone Aegis
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your command of earth magic grows stronger, allowing you to harness it for your allies' protection.

Com a acció bonus, you can grant an aegis to one allied creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. The aegis is a dim, gray aura of earth magic that protects the target. Any dany contundent, tallant o perforant L'objectiu rep is reduced by 2 + your sorcerer level divided by 4. L'efecte dura 1 minut, until you use it again, or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.

A més, quan una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu hits the protected target amb un atac cos a cos, pots, com a reacció, teleport en un espai desocupat que puguis veure within 5 feet of the attacker. You can teleport only if you and the attacker are on the same surface. You can then fer un atac armat cos a cos against the attacker. If that attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 1d10} de dany de força. This extra damage increases to {@dice 2d10} a nivell 11 and {@dice 3d10} a nivell 17.

subclassFeature.name: Stone's Edge
entries: Començant a nivell 14, your mastery of earth magic allows you to add the force of elemental earth to your spells. When you cast a spell that deals damage, choose one creature damaged by that spell on the round you cast it. That creature takes extra force damage equal to half your sorcerer level. This feature can be used only once per casting of a spell.

subclassFeature.name: Earth Master's Aegis
entries: Començant a nivell 18, when you use your Stone Aegis to protect an ally, you can choose up to three creatures to gain its benefits.

subclassFeature.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: An alien influence has wrapped its tendrils around you, warping you in both body and mind. Perhaps a psychic splinter lodged in your psyche after you suffered domination by an aboleth. Maybe you were born somewhere tainted by the Far Realm, a planar blot that changed you forever. Or perhaps mind flayers kidnapped you, subjecting you to the nightmarish process of ceremorphosis—but the transformation failed and left you altered.

subclassFeature.name: Invasive Thoughts
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 1}

A nivell 1, you gain the ability to use a bonus action to magically create a telepathic link with one creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. Until the link ends, you can telepathically speak to the target through the link, and if it understands at least one language, it can speak telepathically to you. The link dura 10 minuts, and it ends early si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} o si mors, or if you use another bonus action to break the link or to establish this link with a different creature.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Spells
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 1}

Començant a nivell 1, your aberrant nature changes your mind in subtle but profound ways. You learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown on the Psionic Spells table. The spell counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

entries.caption: Psionic Spells
rows: {@spell arms of Hadar}, {@spell xiuxiuejos de disbauxa}
{@spell apaivagar emocions}, {@spell detectar pensaments}
{@spell hunger of Hadar}, {@spell encàrrec}
{@spell rampell}, {@spell Tentacles Obscurs de l'Evard}
{@spell modify memory}, {@spell Rary's telepathic bond}

subclassFeature.name: Unique Disturbance
entries: Regardless of its genesis, the Aberrant Mind origin imparts a sense of eeriness to the character or their surroundings. This can be as subtle as when your sorcerer reads a creature's mind with detectar pensaments, anyone in their immediate vicinity experiences a faint but pervasive sense of dread. Or it could be unmistakable, such as sweating a sheen of viscous mucus when you're scared, or your pupils squirming when you're excited. Consider the potentially unspeakable source of your sorcerer's powers, and use that as a guide to weave threads of eeriness throughout your magic.

subclassFeature.name: Warped Being
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 1}

Començant a nivell 1, your aberrant origin protects you from harm. Your body might have a coating of viscous slime, tough hide, scales, or an invisible psionic barrier (choose the form of protection when you gain this feature). Whatever form the protection takes, your AC equals 13 + el teu modificador de Destresa while you aren't wearing armor.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Sorcery
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 6}

Començant a nivell 6, when you cast any of the spells gained from your Psionic Spells feature, you can cast it by expending a spell slot as normal or by spending a number of punts de fetilleria equal to the spell's level. If you cast the spell using punts de fetilleria, it requires no components.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Defenses
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 6}
A nivell 6, you gain resistance to psychic damage, and tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Revelation in Flesh
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 14}

Començant a nivell 14, you can unleash the aberrant truth hidden within your flesh. Com a acció bonus, you can spend 1 or more punts de fetilleria to magically transform your body durant 1 minut. For each punt de fetilleria you spend, you can gain one of the following benefits (escull), the effects of which last until the transformation ends:

items: Obténs una velocitat de natació equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar and the ability to breathe water. Gills grow from your neck or fan out from behind your ears, your fingers become webbed, or you grow lashing cilia that extend through your clothing.
You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can hover. As you fly, your skin glistens with mucus.

Your body, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, becomes slimy and pliable. You can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing, and you can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.
Your eyes turn black or become writhing sensory tendrils. You are aware of the location of any hidden or {@condition invisible} creature a 60 peus de tu.

subclassFeature.name: Warp Reality
entries: {@i tret de Aberrant Mind a nivell 18}

A nivell 18, you become the focal point of a reality-warping anomaly. Com a acció, you can magically radiate a transparent, 20-foot-radius aura durant 1 minut. This might take the form of a sphere of rippling psychic energy, a fluctuating amoebic gel, an extrusion of ephemeral parasites, or some other manifestation. Other creatures treat the aura as difficult terrain, and when they start their turn in it, they take {@damage 2d10} de dany psíquic. When you activate this feature, you can choose any number of creatures que puguis veure to be unaffected by the aura.

Com a acció bonus, you can end the aura early. Si ho fas, you and any number of creatures you choose within the aura are teleported to a location que puguis veure within 1 mile of you. Tota criatura must appear a 20 peus de tu and in an unoccupied space. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Carisma saving throw contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur is not teleported. Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Storm Sorcery
entries: Your innate magic comes from the power of elemental air. Perhaps you were born during a howling gale so powerful that folk still tell stories of it. Your lineage might include the influence of potent air creatures such as vaati or djinni. Whatever the case, the magic of the storm permeates your soul.

Storm sorcerers are invaluable members of a ship's crew. Their magic allows them to exert control over wind and weather in their immediate area. Their abilities also prove useful in repelling attacks by sahuagin, pirates, and other waterborne threats.

subclassFeature.name: Stormborn
entries: The arcane magic you command is infused with elemental air. You can speak, read, and write {@language Primordial}. A més, you gain the following spells at the listed sorcerer level. These spells do not count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

entries.caption: Storm Sorcerer Bonus Spells
rows: {@spell Núvol de boira}, {@spell tronada}
{@spell Ràfega de vent}, {@spell levitate}
{@spell Invocar Llamps}, {@spell tempesta d'aiguaneu}
{@spell Conjure minor elementals}*, {@spell tempesta de gel}
{@spell Convocar elemental}**
footnotes: * Unless you gain this spell from another source, you can summon only {@creature smoke mephit||smoke mephits}, {@creature steam mephit||steam mephits}, {@creature ice mephit||ice mephits}, or {@creature dust mephit||dust mephits} with it.
**Unless you gain this spell from another source, you can summon only {@creature air elemental||air elementals} with it.

subclassFeature.name: Tempestuous Magic
entries: A nivell 1, you are attuned to elemental air magic. Whenever you cast a spell other than a cantrip durant el teu torn, whirling gusts of elemental air surround you. Pots, com a acció bonus, to fly 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: A nivell 6, you gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage. Whenever you cast a spell other than a cantrip that deals lightning or thunder damage, a stormy aura surrounds you. In addition to the spell's effects, creatures (escull) a 10 peus de tu take lightning or thunder damage (choose each time this ability activates) equal to half your sorcerer level.

subclassFeature.name: Storm Guide
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to subtly control the weather around you.
If it is raining, you can use an action to cause the rain to stop falling in a 20‐foot radius centered on you. You can end this effect com a acció bonus.

If it is windy, pots, com a acció bonus, each round to choose the direction that the wind blows in a 100‐foot radius around you. The wind blows in that direction fins el final del teu proper torn. You have no ability to alter the speed of the wind.

subclassFeature.name: Storm's Fury
entries: A nivell 14, the storm energy you channel through your magic seethes within your soul. When you are hit by a atac cos a cos, pots, com a reacció, deal lightning damage to the attacker equal to your sorcerer level. The attacker must also make a Força saving throw, with a DC equal to 8 + your Carisma bonus + el teu bonus de competència. Si falla, the attacker is pushed en línia recta 20 peus lluny de tu.

subclassFeature.name: Wind Soul
entries: A nivell 18, you gain una velocitat de vol de 60 peus and immunity to lightning and thunder damage. Com a acció, you can reduce your flying speed to 30 feet for one hour and choose a number of creatures a 30 peus de tu equal to 3 + el teu modificador de Carisma. les criatures designades gain una velocitat de vol de 30 peus durant 1 hora.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Soul
entries: Sometimes the spark of magic that fuels a sorcerer comes from a divine source that glimmers within the soul. Having such a blessed soul is a sign that your innate magic might come from a distant but powerful familial connection to a divine being. Perhaps your ancestor was an angel, transformed into a mortal and sent to fight in a god's name.
Or your birth might align with an ancient prophecy, marking you as a servant of the gods or a chosen vessel of divine magic.

A Divine Soul, with a natural magnetism, is seen as a threat by some religious hierarchies. As an outsider who commands sacred power, a Divine Soul can undermine an existing order by claiming a direct tie to the divine.

In some cultures, only those who can claim the power of a Divine Soul may command religious power. In these lands, ecclesiastical positions are dominated by a few bloodlines and preserved over generations.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Magic
entries: Your link to the divine allows you to learn spells from the cleric class. When your Spellcasting feature lets you learn or replace a sorcerer cantrip or a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher, you can choose the new spell de la llista de conjurs de clèrgue or the sorcerer spell list. You must otherwise obey all the restrictions for selecting the spell, and it becomes a sorcerer spell for you.

A més, choose an affinity for the source of your divine power: good, evil, law, chaos, or neutrality. You learn an additional spell based on that affinity, as shown below. It is a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against your number of sorcerer spells known. If you later replace this spell, you must replace it with a spell de la llista de conjurs de clèrgue.
