subclassFeature.name: Favored by the Gods
entries: Començant a nivell 1, divine power guards your destiny. If you fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Healing
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the divine energy coursing through you can empower healing spells. Whenever you or an ally a 5 peus de tu rolls dice to determine the number of punts de vida a spell restores, pots gastar 1 punt de fetilleria to reroll any number of those dice once, provided you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. Només pots emprar aquest tret un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Wings
entries: Començant a nivell 14, pots, com a acció bonus, to manifest a pair of spectral wings from your back. While the wings are present, tens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. The wings last until you're {@condition incapacitated}, you die, or you dismiss them com a acció bonus.
The affinity you chose for your Divine Magic feature determines the appearance of the spectral wings: eagle wings for good or law, bat wings for evil or chaos, and dragonfly wings for neutrality.

subclassFeature.name: Unearthly Recovery
entries: A nivell 18, you gain the ability to overcome grievous injuries. Com a acció bonus when you have fewer than half of your punts de vida remaining, you can regain a number of punts de vida equal to half els teus punts de vida màxims.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Magic
entries: You are a creature of shadow, for your innate magic comes from the Erm de l'Ombra itself. You might trace your lineage to an entity from that place, or perhaps you were exposed to its fell energy and transformed by it.

The power of shadow magic casts a strange pall over your physical presence. The spark of life that sustains you is muffled, as if it struggles to remain viable against the dark energy that imbues your soul. At your option, you can pick from or roll on the Shadow Sorcerer Quirks table to create a quirk for your character.

entries.caption: Shadow Sorcerer Quirks
rows: You are always icy cold to the touch.
When you are asleep, you don't appear to breathe (though you must still breathe to survive).
You barely bleed, even when badly injured.
Your heart beats once per minute. This event sometimes surprises you.
You have trouble remembering that living creatures and corpses should be treated differently.
You blinked. Once. Last week.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Dark
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you have {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 120 peus.

Quan arribes a nivell 3 en aquesta classe, aprèns el conjur {@spell foscor}, which doesn't count against your number of sorcerer spells known. A més, you can cast it by spending 2 punts de fetilleria or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with punts de fetilleria, que puguis veure through the {@spell foscor} created by the spell.

subclassFeature.name: Força of the Grave
entries: Començant a nivell 1, your existence in a twilight state between life and death makes you difficult to defeat. When damage reduces you to 0 punts de vida, you can make a Carisma saving throw (CD 5 + the damage taken). On a success, you instead drop to 1 punt de vida. You can't use this feature if you are reduced to 0 punts de vida by radiant damage or by a critical hit.
After the saving throw succeeds, no pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Hound of Ill Omen
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to call forth a howling creature of darkness to harass your foes. Com a acció bonus, pots gastar 3 punts de fetilleria to magically summon a hound of ill omen to target one creature que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu. The hound uses the {@creature dire wolf}'s statistics (see the Monster Manual or appendix C in the Player's Handbook), with the following changes:

items: The hound is size Medium, not Large, and it counts as a monstrosity, not a beast.
It appears with a number of punts de vida temporals equal to half your sorcerer level.
It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The hound takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
At the start of its turn, the hound automatically knows its target's location. If the target was hidden, it is no longer hidden from the hound.

entries: The hound appears en un espai desocupat (escull) within 30 feet of the target. Roll initiative for the hound. On its turn, it can move only toward its target by the most direct route, and it can use its action only to attack its target. The hound can make opportunity attacks, but only against its target. A més, while the hound is within 5 feet of the target, the target has disadvantage on saving throws against any spell you cast. The hound disappears if it is reduced to 0 punts de vida, if its target is reduced to 0 punts de vida, or after 5 minutes.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Walk
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to step from one shadow into another. When you are in dim light or darkness, com a acció bonus, you can magically teleport fins a 120 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure that is also in dim light or darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Form
entries: Començant a nivell 18, pots gastar 6 punts de fetilleria com a acció bonus to magically transform yourself into a shadowy form. In this form, tens resistència a tot tipus de dany except force and radiant damage, and you can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. You take 5 force damage if you end your turn inside an object.
You remain in this form durant 1 minut. It ends early si et quedes {@condition incapacitated}, if you die, or if you dismiss it com a acció bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Storm Sorcery
entries: Your innate magic comes from the power of elemental air. Many with this power can trace their magic back to a near-death experience caused by the Great Rain, but perhaps you were born during a howling gale so powerful that folk still tell stories of it, or your lineage might include the influence of potent air creatures such as djinn. Whatever the case, the magic of the storm permeates your being.

Storm sorcerers are invaluable members of a ship's crew. Their magic allows them to exert control over wind and weather in their immediate area. Their abilities also prove useful in repelling attacks by sahuagin, pirates, and other waterborne threats.

entries: Començant a nivell 1, pots, com a acció bonus, en el teu torn to cause whirling gusts of elemental air to briefly surround you, immediately before or after you cast a spell of 1st level or higher. Doing so allows you to fly fins a 10 peus without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Wind Speaker
entries: The arcane magic you command is infused with elemental air. You can speak, read, and write {@language Primordial}. Knowing this language allows you to understand and be understood by those who speak its dialects: {@language Aquan}, {@language Auran}, {@language Ignan}, i {@language Terran}.

A més, whenever you start casting a spell of 1st level or higher that deals lightning or thunder damage, stormy magic erupts from you. This eruption causes creatures (escull) que puguis veure a 10 peus de tu to take lightning or thunder damage (choose each time this ability activates) equal to half your sorcerer level.

The attacker must also make a Força saving throw contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de sorcerer. Si falla, the attacker is pushed en línia recta fins a 20 peus lluny de tu.
